title: Part A(i) & Part A(ii)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria:
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes three of the following criteria.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: The first, second, and fifth points of part (b) can be earned if the sphere is not launched.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes three of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes four of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes five of the following criteria.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: The second point of part (c) is not earned for saying “if the numbers are the same” or similar phrasing that does not address experimental uncertainty.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the following criteria:
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria:
The response accurately includes both of the following criteria:
